content: NRJustin - Do you not find it ironic that your own civil wars and revolutions have probably killed far more Chinese people than the Japanese - reprehensible as they may be - ever did? Can you honestly say that China is anywhere near as free as Japan or that the Chinese government does not treat man of its people very badly? I doubt it. Let's be honest the place with the most freedom in the whole of China is only that way because it used to be in someone else's empire and even there in Hong Kong the government does its best to suppress people. Now stop rattling your sabre like a grumpy child and get a grip.
